scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html
scripts.generate-certs-original:
mkdir -p generated/certs && echo "[req]
distinguished_name=req
[ext]
subjectAltName=DNS:localhost,DNS:Florian-Air.fritz.box" > generated/certs/san.cnf && openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA -out generated/certs/private.key -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:2048 && openssl req -new -key generated/certs/private.key -out generated/certs/csr.csr -subj "/CN=NAME-Air.fritz.box" -config generated/certs/san.cnf && openssl x509 -req -in generated/certs/csr.csr -signkey generated/certs/private.key -out generated/certs/certificate.crt -days 365 -extfile generated/certs/san.cnf -extensions ext && rm generated/certs/san.cnf generated/certs/csr.csr
